tool_description: Tracks and analyzes historical diagnostic trouble codes for a vehicle to identify patterns, recurring issues, and maintenance trends.

vehicle_vin.description: Vehicle identification number for history lookup

error_messages: Invalid VIN: Vehicle identification number must be 17 characters and properly formatted.
No historical data: No previous diagnostic records found for this vehicle.
Invalid mileage: Current mileage must be positive and realistic for vehicle age.
Analysis period too long: Historical data only available for specified time range.
usage: Provide vehicle VIN, current DTC codes, and mileage. Optionally specify analysis period in months. Tool identifies recurring patterns and maintenance trends.

recurring_codes.description: DTCs that have appeared multiple times historically

pattern_analysis.description: Summary of diagnostic patterns and trends

maintenance_recommendations.description: Preventive maintenance suggestions based on history

last_occurrence.description: When each current code last appeared
